mapper.sql: id, goods_id AS goodsId, goods_name AS goodsName, seckill_price_cy AS seckillPriceCy, seckill_price_vcy AS seckillPriceVcy, total_stock AS totalStock, residue_stock AS residueStock, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, cas_version AS casVersion, creator_id AS creatorId, creator_name AS creatorName, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, ext1, ext2, ext3
mapper.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT gds.id AS goodsId, gds.goods_name, gds.goods_intro, gds.main_img, gds.sort, gds.goods_type, sk.seckill_price_vcy, sk.residue_stock, sk.start_time, sk.end_time FROM t_mall_seckill sk JOIN t_mall_goods gds ON sk.goods_id = gds.id AND ( sk.start_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} )
